txt.en: The second page of the ledger is a record of the tanning shed on the homestead. If the records are accurate, there should be several dried leather hides ready to collect.
The ledger details out several items around the homestead and their values.
The tanning shed is in the south-east section of the homestead.\n\nThe second page of the ledger indicates the tanning shed should have several dried leathers that would fetch a decent price.
